name: Hoaka Naivalu
story: Hoaka grew up on the island of Guadeloupe in the Caribbean. He joined the French military at a young age and quickly proved his worth as a skilled marksman. He was later recruited by the INDEPENDENT faction as a private guard for their military operations. While he is fiercely loyal to his comrades, he is also very cautious and always thinks before acting. He has yet to find love, focusing instead on his duties as a soldier.
